memberdef.name: throw_exception

briefdescription.para: Generate and throw a TANGO DevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: The exception is created with a single DevError object. A value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the DevError severity field. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: A CORBA System Exception. The reason and desc fields of the DevError object will be set according to the data in this exception. The desc field is always set to API_CorbaSysException and the reason flag is different depending on the exact type of the CORBA system exception.
The exception DevError object origin field
The thrown exception. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (const CORBA::SystemException &ex, char *origin)
memberdef.name: throw_exception

briefdescription.para: Generate and throw a TANGO DevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: The exception is created with a single DevError object. A value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the DevError severity field. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: A CORBA System Exception. The reason and desc fields of the DevError object will be set according to the data in this exception. The desc field is always set to API_CorbaSysException and the reason flag is different depending on the exact type of the CORBA system exception.
The exception DevError object origin field. The memory allocated for this parameter will be freed by this method.
The thrown exception. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (const CORBA::SystemException &ex, const string &origin)
memberdef.name: throw_exception

briefdescription.para: Generate and throw a TANGO DevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: The exception is created with a single DevError object. A value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the DevError severity field. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: A CORBA System Exception. The reason and desc fields of the DevError object will be set according to the data in this exception. The desc field is always set to API_CorbaSysException and the reason flag is different depending on the exact type of the CORBA system exception.
The exception DevError object origin field. The memory allocated for this parameter will be freed by this method.
The thrown exception. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *att_name, const char *reason, const char *desc, const char *origin, Tango::ErrSeverity sever=Tango::ERR)
memberdef.name: throw_named_exception

briefdescription.para: Throw a TANGO MultiDevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: Throw a MultiDevFailed exception with one more DevError object for the attribute with name given as first parameter. A default value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the new DevError severity field. Note that throwing MultiDevFailed exception is allowed only in attribute writing methods. The memory used by the origin and desc parameters will be freed by this method Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: The attribute name
The exception DevError object reason field
The exception DevError object desc field
The exception DevError object origin field
The exception DevError object severity field
The thrown exception. Click here to read MultiDevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< string > &atts, const char *reason, const char *desc, const char *origin, Tango::ErrSeverity sever=Tango::ERR)
memberdef.name: throw_named_exception

briefdescription.para: Throw a TANGO MultiDevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: Throw a MultiDevFailed exception with one more DevError object for the attribute list with names given as first parameter. A default value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the new DevError severity field. Note that throwing MultiDevFailed exception is allowed only in attribute writing methods. The memory used by the origin and desc parameters will be freed by this method Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: The attributes name vector
The exception DevError object reason field
The exception DevError object desc field
The exception DevError object origin field
The exception DevError object severity field
The thrown exception. Click here to read MultiDevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (Tango::DeviceImpl *d, long att_idx, const char *reason, const char *desc, const char *origin, Tango::ErrSeverity sever=Tango::ERR)
memberdef.name: throw_named_exception

briefdescription.para: Throw a TANGO MultiDevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: Throw a MultiDevFailed exception with one more DevError object for one attribute with index given as second parameter. The attributes index is the index received by the write_attr_hardware() method. A default value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the new DevError severity field. Note that throwing MultiDevFailed exception is allowed only in attribute writing methods.
The memory used by the origin and desc parameters will be freed by this method Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: The device pointer
The attributes index
The exception DevError object reason field
The exception DevError object desc field
The exception DevError object origin field
The exception DevError object severity field
The thrown exception. Click here to read MultiDevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (Tango::DeviceImpl *d, vector< long > &atts, const char *reason, const char *desc, const char *origin, Tango::ErrSeverity sever=Tango::ERR)
memberdef.name: throw_named_exception

briefdescription.para: Throw a TANGO MultiDevFailed exception.

detaileddescription.para: Throw a MultiDevFailed exception with one more DevError object for the attribute list with indexes given as second parameter. The attributes indexes are the index received by the write_attr_hardware() method. A default value "Tango::ERR" is defined for the new DevError severity field. Note that throwing MultiDevFailed exception is allowed only in attribute writing methods.
The memory used by the origin and desc parameters will be freed by this method Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: The device pointer
The attributes indexes vector
The exception DevError object reason field
The exception DevError object desc field
The exception DevError object origin field
The exception DevError object severity field
The thrown exception. Click here to read MultiDevFailed exception specification

memberdef.argsstring: (Tango::DevFailed &ex1, Tango::DevFailed &ex2)
memberdef.name: compare_exception

briefdescription.para: Compare two Tango DevFailed exceptions for equality.

detaileddescription.para: The two DevFailed exceptions are verified by comparing the reason, origin, description and severity of all exceptions in the error stack. The strings reason, origin and description are compared literally. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

parameterdescription.para: The first DevFailed exception
The second DevFailed exception

simplesect.para: A boolean set to true if the two exceptions are equal

memberdef.argsstring: (const CORBA::SystemException *)
memberdef.name: print_CORBA_SystemException

memberdef.argsstring: (const CORBA::SystemException *, char *err_msg)
memberdef.name: print_CORBA_SystemException_r

briefdescription.para: Container class for all exception related methods.

detaileddescription.para: Most of these methods are static methods
